column1: Tassin la Demi-Lune is a commune in Lyon Metropolis in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region of central-eastern France. In 2017
column3: 297. Its inhabitants are named Tassilunois in French.

column1: The town of Tassin-la-Demi-Lune is located in the western suburbs of Lyon and is part of Lyon Metropolis.
The city is connected by four train stations: Écully-la-Demi-Lune
Several bus lines connect the city to the metro station Gorge de Loup (Line D): strong lines C21
column3: as well as the normal bus lines 14
column6: 86 and 98. Line 5 and 55 also connected the city to other metro stations.
